sentences.en: Ext2fs is designed for block devices like IDE devices, where the logical block size will be on the order of 512 bytes, 1 kilobyte, and so on.
sentences.cn: Ext2fs 是为象 IDE 设备那样的块设备设计的，这些设备的逻辑块大小是 512 字节，1 K 字节等这样的倍数。

trans.tran_en: a unit for measuring computer information, equal to 1,024 bytes
